contents.text: Thank you for calling Terminus Software in San Francisco, the ABM platform B2B marketers love.
For Sales and Marketing Solutions, press 1.
For a personalized product demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for your product demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Terminus Software product demo as soon as possible
As a veteran-owned business, I’d like a personalized walk-through of your ABM platform.
I want to schedule a personalized ABM platform demo focusing on campaign orchestration.
I need a step-by-step demo of your marketing software to understand how it works.
I’d like to arrange a personalized demo of your ABM platform to evaluate its segmentation tools for my physics department’s lab outreach.

contents.text: To discuss pricing and licensing options, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing team to review licensing options.

navigationGoals: Review Terminus Software pricing and licensing options for my marketing team
As a veteran entrepreneur, I want to discuss pricing tiers and licensing options for my team.
I want a detailed pricing and licensing breakdown for your enterprise ABM solution.
I'd like to learn about your pricing plans and licensing options for the platform.
I need to review your pricing plans and academic licensing options for student-led marketing experiments.

contents.text: For Technical Support and Onboarding Services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support specialists.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue I’m encountering with the Terminus platform
I’m encountering a technical error and need support troubleshooting the platform.
I need help troubleshooting API integration and authentication errors with Terminus.
I'm having trouble with the software and need technical support to fix it.
I’m experiencing an error with the API connector in my student sandbox and need technical support to resolve it.

contents.text: For onboarding and integration assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our onboarding and integration team.

navigationGoals: Get help integrating Terminus Software with our CRM system
I need help onboarding and integrating Terminus with our existing systems.
I need assistance configuring and integrating Terminus with our Salesforce CRM.
I need assistance setting up and integrating the software into my system.
I need assistance onboarding and integrating Terminus with Salesforce for my lab’s campaign data pipeline.
